column1: Local Foods////You order at the counter
column2: and are given a number to bring back to your table. Warning: this place gets popular
column3: so you may want to stake out a table while you wait for your order. (My friends call this "sharking" a table. YMMV). There's a variety of booths and tables
column4: but it can be hard to find space for groups over 4 people.
